wikipedia_page.main: George Isaac Huntingford (1748–1832) was successively of Bishop of Gloucester and Bishop of Hereford.

response: *89. George Huntingford, 1815–32. Per fess Sa. and erminois, a fess per fess nebulee counterchanged, in chief three crosses patee fitchee, Argent, the base fretty Gu. College of Arms. Memorial window in Hereford Cathedral.
